Package com.hexaware.dao

Class EmployeeDAO

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.EmployeeDAO
public class EmployeeDAO extends Object
The 'EmployeeDAO' class provides the data access operations related to the employees in the database. It includes the method to show the employee details, insert the employee informations, show the specific employee details and remove the employee.
Since:
2024-02-04
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rajadurai M
